Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the inauguration has been cancelled and major TV networks are set to lose their licenses.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the inauguration has not been cancelled and that major TV networks are not set to lose their licenses.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a debunked post and a message from an unverified source.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump has invoked the Insurrection Act and will remain in power indefinitely, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim provides an alternative explanation to the reality of the situation by spreading misinformation about the inauguration and TV networks.
